content:
dhil opened issue #10252:

PR #10251 adds support for exception and control tags in Wasmtime. At the time of writing it lacks:

  • [ ] C API support
  • [ ] Component model support

dhil edited issue #10252:

PR #10251 adds support for exception and control tags in Wasmtime. At the time of writing it lacks:

  • [ ] C API support
  • [ ] Component model support
  • [ ] Fuzzing support
